subject: EVP-Radio Crime Recording Video
author: Michael E
full_text:
Hi everyone, I have recorded a video of my EVP-Radio Crime recording 
process, where I get leads from deceased victims and hand over to law 
enforcement or missing person advocates to run the leads.

http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=WhGKXBp6Lg0

I went out to Mike Colletta's site to see if there was any guidance, 
but none on how to sync up my voice in the video.

I used a web cam to do the recording.

Does anyone know how to do this?

Mike Edwards
